alert.note: Alert for Martin; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Martin and north central Pike Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over McClure, or near Inez, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warfield, Lovely and Beauty around 525 PM EDT. Coalpoint, Pilgrim, Laura, Threeforks, Heenan and Jarad around 530 PM EDT. Oppy around 535 PM EDT. Hatfield Station around 540 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Whitepost, Rural, Conder, Heisey, Sidney, Turkey Creek, Forest Hills, Belfry, Hardy and Huddy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
